abilities.name: Skulking Horrors
abilities.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to D6".

abilities.name: Bounding Leap
abilities.description: This unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.

abilities.name: Scouts 8"
abilities.description: This unit can make a Normal move of up to 8" before the first turn begins. If both players have units that can do this, the player who is taking the first turn moves their units first.

abilities.name: Vanguard Predator
abilities.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. While this unit is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll a Wound roll of 1 as well.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to a Genestealers unit.

abilities.name: Scouts 8"
abilities.description: This unit can make a Normal move of up to 8" before the first turn begins. If both players have units that can do this, the player who is taking the first turn moves their units first.

abilities.name: Hypnotic Gaze (Psychic)
abilities.description: At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model. Until the end of the phase, subtract 1 from the Hit roll of attacks made by that unit.

abilities.name: Vicious Insight
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

abilities.name: Adaptable Predators
abilities.description: This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

abilities.name: Shadow in the Warp, Synapse
abilities.description: While a friendly Tyranids unit is within 6" of one or more units with this ability, models in that unit have the Synapse keyword.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to a Tyranid Warriors unit.

abilities.name: Shadow in the Warp, Synapse
abilities.description: While a friendly Tyranids unit is within 6" of one or more units with this ability, models in that unit have the Synapse keyword.

abilities.name: Alpha Warrior
abilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

abilities.name: Death Blow
abilities.description: If this model is destroyed by a melee attack, if it has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

abilities.name: Leader
abilities.description: This model can be attached to a Tyrant Guard unit.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Will of the Hive Mind
abilities.description: Once per battle round, one friendly TYRANIDS unit within 12" of this model can use a Stratagem for 1CP less than normal (to a minimum of 0CP).

abilities.name: Onslaught (Aura, Psychic)
abilities.description: While a friendly TYRANIDS unit is within 6" of this model, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT] and [LETHAL HITS] abilities.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise 1
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6 before removing it from play. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers 1 mortal wound.

abilities.name: Blistering Assault
abilities.description: Each time this unit is selected to shoot, if it is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal Move of up to D6+2" as if it were your Movement phase. If it does, until the end of the phase, it cannot shoot.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and arrive on a later turn within 9" of any enemy units.

abilities.name: Winged Swarm
abilities.description: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

abilities.name: Fights First
abilities.description: This unit is eligible to fight in the Fight phase before units without this ability.

abilities.name: Infiltrators
abilities.description: During deployment, this unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from the enemy deployment zone and all enemy models.

abilities.name: Lone Operative
abilities.description: Unless this unit is within 3" of one or more friendly TYRANIDS units, this unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 12".

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: If every model in a unit has this ability, then each time a ranged attack is made against it, subtract 1 from that attack's Hit roll.

abilities.name: Feeder Tendrils
abilities.description: Each time this model destroys an enemy CHARACTER model, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Pheromone Trail
abilities.description: Once per battle round, you can target one model with this ability with the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0CP.

abilities.name: Spirit Leech (Aura, Psychic)
abilities.description: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this unit, each time that enemy unit fails a Battle-shock test, it suffers D3 mortal wounds and one model in this unit regains up to D3 lost wounds.

abilities.name: Warp Field (Aura, Psychic)
abilities.description: Friendly TYRANIDS units within 6" of this unit have a 6+ invulnerable save.

abilities.description: Each time this model's Barbed Ovipositor destroys an enemy INFANTRY model, after this model has finished making its attacks, you can add a new RIPPER SWARMS unit containing D3 models to your army and set it up within 6" of this model and not within Engagement Range of any enemy models.

abilities.name: It Itches!

abilities.name: Spawn Termagants
abilities.description: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly TERMAGANTS unit within 6" of this model and return up to D3+3 destroyed models to that unit.

abilities.description: While a friendly TERMAGANTS unit is within 6" of this model, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Disruption Bombardment
abilities.description: Each time a unit is hit by one or more attacks made by this unit's Barblaunchers, until the end of your opponent's next turn, subtract 2" from the Move characteristic of models in that unit and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers 1 mortal wound.

That unit contains 1 model for each model in this unit.

abilities.name: Defensive Stance
abilities.description: Each time you target this unit with the Fire Overwatch Stratagem, hits are scored on unmodified Hit rolls of 5+ instead of only 6. If this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, hits are scored on unmodified Hit rolls of 4+ instead.

When it does, roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. The model that exploded is then destroyed.

While this model is within range of that objective, it has the Feel No Pain 5+ ability and its OC is 15.

abilities.name: Resilient Organism
abilities.description: Once per battle, when an attack is allocated to this model, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

abilities.name: Damaged: 1-5 Wounds Remaining
abilities.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

abilities.name: Deadly Demise D3
abilities.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

abilities.name: Deep Strike
abilities.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves and arrive on a later turn within 9" of any enemy units.

abilities.name: Aerial Seeding
abilities.description: This model must start the battle in Reserves, but neither it nor any units embarked within it are counted towards any limits placed on the number of Strategic Reserves units you can have. This model can be set up in the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase, regardless of any mission rules. Any units embarked within this model must immediately disembark, and they must be set up more than 9" away from all enemy models. This model can then make a Normal move.

abilities.name: Transport
abilities.description: This model has a transport capacity of 20 TYRANIDS INFANTRY models, or 1 MONSTER model with 12 or fewer wounds.

rules.name: Hyper-adaptations
rules.description: At the start of the first battle round, select one Hyper-adaptation to be active for TYRANIDS units for the rest of the battle.

choices.name: Swarming Instincts
choices.description: Each time a TYRANIDS model makes an attack that targets an INFANTRY or SWARM unit, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

choices.name: Hyper-aggression
choices.description: Each time a TYRANIDS model makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

choices.name: Hive Predators
choices.description: Each time a TYRANIDS model makes an attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, a Critical Hit automatically wounds the target and has the [PRECISION] ability.

stratagems.name: Rapid Regeneration
stratagems.description: After an enemy unit selects targets: Target TYRANIDS unit gains Feel No Pain 6+, or Feel No Pain 5+ if within Synapse Range.

stratagems.name: Adrenal Surge
stratagems.description: Start of Fight phase: Up to two TYRANIDS units within Synapse Range (or one anywhere) gain Critical Hits on unmodified Hit rolls of 5+ in melee.

stratagems.name: Death Frenzy
stratagems.description: After enemy selects targets: When a model is destroyed before fighting, on 4+ it fights before being removed.

stratagems.name: Overrun
stratagems.description: Before Consolidation: Unit can Consolidate up to 3" extra if ending in Engagement Range or Synapse Range. If within Synapse Range and not in Engagement Range, can make a Normal Move of up to 6" instead.

stratagems.name: Predatory Imperative
stratagems.description: Select a Hyper-adaptation. Up to two units within Synapse Range (or one anywhere) gain that adaptation in addition to the army's chosen adaptation until your next Command phase.

stratagems.name: Endless Swarm
stratagems.description: Your Command phase: Up to two ENDLESS MULTITUDE units within Synapse Range (or one anywhere) return D3+3 destroyed models.

enhancements.name: Alien Cunning
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER only. After deployment, redeploy up to three TYRANIDS units. Any of them can be placed into Strategic Reserves.

enhancements.name: Perfectly Adapted
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER only. Once per turn, re-roll one Hit roll, Wound roll, Damage roll, Advance roll, Charge roll, or saving throw for the bearer.

enhancements.name: Synaptic Linchpin
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER with Synapse only. Friendly TYRANIDS units within 9" are considered within Synapse Range.

enhancements.name: Adaptive Biology
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER only. Bearer has Feel No Pain 5+. At the start of any turn, if the bearer has lost one or more wounds, it gains Feel No Pain 4+ for the rest of the battle.

rules.name: Insurmountable Odds
rules.description: Each time an enemy unit is selected to shoot, after that unit has finished making its attacks, if one or more models from one or more ENDLESS MULTITUDE units from your army were destroyed as a result of those attacks, each such unit can make a Surge move. To make a Surge move, roll 1D6: the unit can move up to that many inches, but must end that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit (excluding AIRCRAFT). Models can move within Engagement Range of enemy units. A unit cannot make a Surge move if it is Battle-shocked.

stratagems.name: Swarming Masses
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When an ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit is selected to shoot or fight: Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. If that unit has 15 or more models, those weapons have the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.

stratagems.name: Teeming Masses
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When an ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit is selected as the target of an attack: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: Preservation Imperative
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. When an ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit is selected as the target of an attack: Until the end of the phase, for the purposes of the Blast ability, that unit is treated as having fewer than 5 models.

stratagems.name: Synaptic Goading
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. After an ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit within Synapse Range makes a Surge move: That unit can re-roll the Surge move distance roll. In addition, that unit can end that Surge move as close as possible to the closest objective marker instead of the closest enemy unit.

stratagems.name: Unending Waves
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. Your Command phase: Select one destroyed ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit. Place a new identical unit into Strategic Reserves at its full Starting Strength. This does not include any attached CHARACTER units.

stratagems.name: Bounding Advance
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When an ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit Advances: Do not make an Advance roll for that unit. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.

enhancements.name: Relentless Hunger
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS model only. Add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in the bearer's unit.

enhancements.name: Naturalised Camouflage
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS model only. At the start of the first battle round, select up to three friendly ENDLESS MULTITUDE units within 9" of the bearer. Until the end of the battle round, each time a ranged attack targets one of those units, models in that unit have the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

enhancements.name: Piercing Talons
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS model only. Each time a model in the bearer's unit makes an attack, on a Critical Wound, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

enhancements.name: Adrenalised Onslaught
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS model only. Each time the bearer's unit Piles In or Consolidates, models in this unit can move an additional 3".

rules.name: Enraged Behemoths
rules.description: Each time a TYRANIDS MONSTER model from your army makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if that model's unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if that model's unit is Below Half-strength. Additionally, while a TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army (excluding Battle-shocked units) is at its Starting Strength, add 2 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

bonuses.effect: +1 to Hit rolls AND +1 to Wound rolls

stratagems.name: Corrosive Viscera
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. Just after a TYRANIDS MONSTER model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability that cannot FLY is destroyed: Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by that model's Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.

stratagems.name: Rampaging Monstrosities
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When a TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase is selected to fight: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: Savage Roar
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. Just after an enemy unit has selected its targets (and one of your TYRANIDS MONSTER units was selected as a target): The enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If that Battle-shock test is failed, subtract 1 from the Wound roll as well.

stratagems.name: Untrammelled Ferocity
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. When a TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to move this phase is selected to move: Until the end of the phase, models in that unit can move through models (excluding TITANIC models) and through sections of terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there, and can move within Engagement Range of enemy models (but cannot end their move within Engagement Range of enemy models). In addition, models in that unit can move through sections of terrain features that are more than 4" in height, but if they do, after that unit has moved, roll one D6: on a 1, that unit is Battle-shocked.

stratagems.name: Swarm-guided Salvoes
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When a TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase is selected to shoot: Until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability, and each time a model in that unit makes an attack, it can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack's Ballistic Skill characteristic.

stratagems.name: Massive Impact
stratagems.description: Epic Deed. Just after a TYRANIDS MONSTER model from your army ends a Charge move: Select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of that model. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

enhancements.name: Ominous Presence
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS MONSTER model only. Add 3 to the Objective Control characteristic of the bearer.

enhancements.name: Enraged Reserves
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS MONSTER model only. If the bearer is destroyed by a melee attack, if it has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 3+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model's unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

enhancements.name: Null Nodules
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS MONSTER model only. Once per battle, when a Psychic Attack is allocated to the bearer, you can use this Enhancement. If you do, until the end of the phase, the bearer has the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

enhancements.name: Monstrous Nemesis
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS MONSTER model only. Each time the bearer makes a melee attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

rules.name: Feed the Swarm
rules.description: In your Command phase, each HARVESTER unit from your army can Regenerate one friendly TYRANIDS unit that is within 6" of it. A unit can only be Regenerated once per phase. When a unit Regenerates: One model regains up to D3+1 lost wounds, OR one destroyed INFANTRY model (excluding CHARACTERS) is returned with its full wounds, OR if that unit has the ENDLESS MULTITUDE keyword, up to 3 destroyed models are returned instead.

stratagems.name: Tyrannoformed
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. Your Command phase: Select one HARVESTER unit from your army within range of an objective marker. That objective marker is now a Sticky Objective (remains under your control even if you move away, until your opponent controls it).

stratagems.name: Ablative Carapace
stratagems.description: Epic Deed. When a HARVESTER unit from your army is selected as the target of an attack: Until the end of the phase, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

stratagems.name: Rapacious Hunger
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When a TYRANIDS unit from your army destroys an enemy unit in the Fight phase: That unit can immediately Regenerate. If it is a HARVESTER unit and you choose to regain wounds, it regains 3 wounds instead of D3+1.

stratagems.name: Secure Biomass
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. Your Movement phase: Select one HARVESTER unit from your army. Until the end of the turn, that unit has the Objective Secured ability.

stratagems.name: Broodguard Impulse
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. When a HARVESTER unit from your army is destroyed: Until the end of your next turn, each time a friendly TYRANIDS unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Visceral Biomass
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When a HARVESTER unit from your army is selected to fight: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, on a Critical Wound that attack has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

enhancements.name: Biophagic Flow
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER only. While a friendly HARVESTER model is within 12" of the bearer, that model can use its Regeneration ability at a range of 9" instead of 6".

enhancements.name: Instinctive Defence
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER only. While the bearer is within 6" of one or more friendly HARVESTER units: You can target the bearer's unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and models in the bearer's unit have the Fights First ability.

enhancements.name: Parasitic Biomorphology
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER only. Add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by the bearer. Each time the bearer destroys an enemy unit in the Fight phase while within 6" of a friendly HARVESTER unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by the bearer for the rest of the battle.

enhancements.name: Enhanced Regeneration
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER only. The bearer's unit can be Regenerated up to twice per Command phase instead of once. This does not apply to MONSTER models.

rules.name: Questing Tendrils
rules.description: TYRANIDS units from your army can declare a charge even if they Fell Back this turn. VANGUARD INVADER units from your army can declare a charge even if they Advanced this turn.

stratagems.name: Seeded Broods
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. Your Movement phase: Select up to two VANGUARD INVADER units from your army that are in Strategic Reserves, or one other TYRANIDS unit. Those units can arrive from Strategic Reserves this turn as if it were one battle round later than it actually is.

stratagems.name: Invisible Hunter
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. Your Movement phase: Select one VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army. Remove that unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.name: Assassin Beasts
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When a VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army is selected to fight: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack that targets a CHARACTER unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Reactive Movement
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. When an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance, or Fall Back move within 9" of a VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army: That VANGUARD INVADER unit can make a Normal move of up to 6".

stratagems.name: Strategic Withdrawal
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. At the start of the Fight phase: Select one VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of any enemy units. Remove that unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

stratagems.name: Lurking Horror
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When a VANGUARD INVADER unit from your army is selected as the target of an attack: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

enhancements.name: Adrenalised Onslaught
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS model only. Each time the bearer's unit Piles In or Consolidates, models in that unit can move an additional 3".

enhancements.name: Chameleonic
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS model only. The bearer's unit has the Stealth ability and the Benefit of Cover.

enhancements.name: Neuronode
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER only. After deployment, you can redeploy up to three TYRANIDS units from your army. Any of those units can be placed into Strategic Reserves.

enhancements.name: Hunting Grounds
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER only. While the bearer is on the battlefield, each time an enemy unit is set up on the battlefield from Strategic Reserves or using a Deep Strike ability, that unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

rules.name: Synaptic Imperatives
rules.description: At the start of each battle round, select one Synaptic Imperative to be active until the end of the battle round. While a TYRANIDS unit from your army is within Synapse Range, it benefits from the selected imperative.

choices.name: Synaptic Augmentation
choices.description: Models in this unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

choices.name: Surging Vitality
choices.description: Add 1 to Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit.

choices.name: Goaded to Slaughter
choices.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

stratagems.name: Imperative Dominance
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. Select one TYRANIDS unit from your army within Synapse Range. Select one Synaptic Imperative (even if it was selected previously). That unit gains the benefits of that imperative until the start of your next Command phase.

stratagems.name: Override Instincts
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. When a TYRANIDS unit from your army within Synapse Range that Fell Back this turn is selected to shoot or declare a charge: That unit can shoot and declare charges this turn even though it Fell Back.

stratagems.name: Synaptic Amplification
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When a TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army is selected to shoot or fight: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll. In addition, select one ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit within 6" of that unit; until the end of the phase, each time a model in that ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Psychic Imperative
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When a TYRANIDS PSYKER unit from your army is selected to shoot: Until the end of the phase, each time that unit makes a Psychic Attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Neural Dominion
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. Your Command phase: Select one enemy unit within 12" of a SYNAPSE unit from your army. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

stratagems.name: The Will of the Hive Mind
stratagems.description: Epic Deed. When a SYNAPSE model from your army is destroyed: Until the end of the battle, the range of the Synapse ability for all other SYNAPSE models from your army is increased to 9".

enhancements.name: Power of the Hive Mind
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS PSYKER only. Add 1 to the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of Psychic weapons equipped by the bearer.

enhancements.name: Psychostatic Disruption
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS SYNAPSE model only. Each time an enemy unit within 12" of the bearer is selected to shoot or fight, if that unit is Battle-shocked, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

enhancements.name: Synaptic Control
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS model only. Each time an attack is allocated to a model in the bearer's unit, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack (to a minimum of 1).

enhancements.name: The Dirgeheart of Kharis
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER only. Each time an enemy unit fails a Battle-shock test within 12" of the bearer, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

rules.name: Tunnel Networks
rules.description: Each time a BURROWERS unit from your army is set up on the battlefield from Strategic Reserves, you can place one Tunnel Marker anywhere on the battlefield within 6" of that unit and more than 1" from all enemy models. TYRANIDS units can use Tunnel Markers to redeploy. In addition, each time a TYRANIDS model makes an attack, you can re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

stratagems.name: Tunnel Network
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. At the end of your Movement phase: Select one TYRANIDS unit from your army within 9" of a Tunnel Marker. Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up within 9" of a different Tunnel Marker and more than 6" from all enemy models.

stratagems.name: Replenishing Swarms
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. Your Movement phase: Select one TYRANIDS unit from your army within 9" of a Tunnel Marker. One model in that unit regains D3+1 lost wounds, or D3+1 destroyed models with 1 wound are returned to that unit.

stratagems.name: Swarming Assault
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When a TYRANIDS MONSTER unit from your army declares a charge: Until the end of the phase, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for that unit and any other friendly TYRANIDS units within 6" of that unit.

stratagems.name: Enfilading Emergence
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. At the end of your Movement phase: Select one TYRANIDS unit from your army that was set up on the battlefield from Strategic Reserves this turn. Until the end of the turn, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] and [IGNORES COVER] abilities.

stratagems.name: Ambush Predators
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When a BURROWERS unit from your army is selected to fight: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, on a Critical Hit, add 1 to the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Subterranean Strike
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. At the end of your Movement phase: Select one BURROWERS unit from your army. Remove that unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

enhancements.name: Tremor Senses
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER only. After deployment, you can redeploy up to three TYRANIDS units from your army. Any of those units can be placed into Strategic Reserves.

enhancements.name: Vanguard Intellect
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER only. The bearer's unit can be set up from Strategic Reserves in the first battle round.

enhancements.name: Trygon Alpha
enhancements.description: TRYGON only. Add 1 to the Weapon Skill and Strength characteristics of the bearer.

enhancements.name: Bio-electric Pulse Node
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS MONSTER only. Add 6" to the range of ranged weapons equipped by the bearer, and those weapons have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

rules.name: Leader-beasts
rules.description: TYRANID WARRIORS and WINGED TYRANID PRIME units from your army have a 5+ invulnerable save. In addition, TYRANID WARRIORS units from your army have the Battleline keyword and have an Objective Control characteristic of 3.

stratagems.name: Synaptic Amplification
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When a TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army is selected to shoot or fight: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll of 1 and the Wound roll of 1. In addition, select one ENDLESS MULTITUDE unit within 6"; until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll of 1.

stratagems.name: Spontaneous Hypercorrosion
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When a TYRANID WARRIORS or WINGED TYRANID PRIME unit from your army is selected to shoot or fight: Until the end of the phase, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit, or add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons instead.

stratagems.name: Synaptic Shield
stratagems.description: Battle Tactic. When one of your TYRANIDS units is selected as the target of an attack: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack is made against that unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Warrior Resurgence
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. Your Command phase: Select one TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army. Return one destroyed TYRANID WARRIOR model to that unit with its full wounds remaining.

stratagems.name: Secure Position
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. Your Command phase: Select one TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army within range of an objective marker. That objective marker is now a Sticky Objective.

stratagems.name: Synapse Conduit
stratagems.description: Strategic Ploy. When a TYRANID WARRIORS unit from your army is selected to use a Stratagem: Until the end of the phase, that Stratagem affects all friendly TYRANID WARRIORS units within 6" of that unit.

enhancements.name: Synaptic Tyrant
enhancements.description: NEUROTYRANT only. The bearer has the Leader ability and can be attached to TYRANID WARRIORS units.

enhancements.name: Ocular Adaptation
enhancements.description: WINGED TYRANID PRIME only. While the bearer is leading a unit, add 1 to the Hit roll of attacks made by models in that unit.

enhancements.name: Sensory Assimilation
enhancements.description: WINGED TYRANID PRIME only. While the bearer is leading a unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

enhancements.name: Elevated Might
enhancements.description: TYRANIDS CHARACTER only. The bearer's unit can Advance and declare charges in the same turn.

coreStratagems.name: Command Re-roll
coreStratagems.when: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon.
coreStratagems.target: An attack, model or unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: In any phase, just after you have made a Hit roll, a Wound roll, a Damage roll, a saving throw, an Advance roll, a Charge roll, a Desperate Escape test, a Hazardous test, or just after you have rolled the dice to determine the number of attacks made with a weapon. TARGET: An attack, model or unit from your army. EFFECT: You re-roll that roll, test or saving throw.

coreStratagems.name: Counter-offensive
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has fought. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units and that has not already been selected to fight this phase. EFFECT: Your unit fights next.

coreStratagems.name: Epic Challenge
coreStratagems.when: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight.
coreStratagems.target: One CHARACTER model in your unit.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Fight phase, when a CHARACTER unit from your army that is within Engagement Range of one or more Attached units is selected to fight. TARGET: One CHARACTER model in your unit. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all melee attacks made by that model have the [PRECISION] ability.

coreStratagems.name: Fire Overwatch
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Movement or Charge phase, just after an enemy unit is set up or when an enemy unit starts or ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 24" of that enemy unit and that would be eligible to shoot if it were your Shooting phase. EFFECT: Your unit can shoot that enemy unit as if it were your Shooting phase. RESTRICTIONS: An unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit. You can only use this Stratagem once per turn.

coreStratagems.name: Go to Ground
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
coreStratagems.target: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
coreStratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets. TARGET: One INFANTRY unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks. EFFECT: Until the end of the phase, all models in your unit have a 6+ invulnerable save and have the Benefit of Cover.

coreStratagems.name: Grenade
coreStratagems.target: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Shooting phase. TARGET: One GRENADES unit from your army that is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and has not been selected to shoot this phase. EFFECT: Select one enemy unit that is not within Engagement Range of any units from your army and is within 8" of and visible to your GRENADES unit. Roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

coreStratagems.name: Heroic Intervention
coreStratagems.when: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit ends a Charge move. TARGET: One unit from your army that is within 6" of that enemy unit and would be eligible to declare a charge against that enemy unit if it were your Charge phase. EFFECT: Your unit now declares a charge that targets only that enemy unit, and you resolve that charge as if it were your Charge phase. RESTRICTIONS: You can only select a VEHICLE unit if it is a WALKER. Your unit does not receive any Charge bonus this turn.

coreStratagems.name: Insane Bravery
coreStratagems.when: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army.
coreStratagems.target: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems).
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Battle-shock step of your Command phase, just after you have failed a Battle-shock test taken for a unit from your army. TARGET: The unit from your army that Battle-shock test was just taken for (even though your Battle-shocked units cannot normally be affected by your Stratagems). EFFECT: Your unit is treated as having passed that test instead, and is not Battle-shocked as a result.

coreStratagems.name: Rapid Ingress
coreStratagems.when: End of your opponent's Movement phase.
coreStratagems.target: One unit from your army that is in Reserves.
coreStratagems.effect: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase.
coreStratagems.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: End of your opponent's Movement phase. TARGET: One unit from your army that is in Reserves. EFFECT: Your unit can arrive on the battlefield as if it were the Reinforcements step of your Movement phase. RESTRICTIONS: You cannot use this Stratagem to enable a unit to arrive during a battle round it would not normally be able to do so in.

coreStratagems.name: Tank Shock
coreStratagems.target: One VEHICLE unit from your army.
coreStratagems.effect: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).
coreStratagems.description: WHEN: Your Charge phase. TARGET: One VEHICLE unit from your army. EFFECT: After your unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one melee weapon your unit is equipped with. Roll a number of D6 equal to that weapon's Strength characteristic. If that Strength characteristic is greater than that enemy unit's Toughness characteristic, roll two additional D6. For each 5+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound (to a maximum of 6 mortal wounds).

synapse.name: Synapse
synapse.description: A Tyranids unit is within Synapse Range when it is within 6" of one or more friendly SYNAPSE models. While within Synapse Range, each time that unit takes a Battle-shock test, take that test on 3D6 instead of 2D6.

shadow_in_the_warp.name: Shadow in the Warp
shadow_in_the_warp.description: Once per battle, in either player's Command phase, if one or more units with this ability are on the battlefield, every enemy unit on the battlefield must take a Battle-shock test. If an enemy unit is within 6" of one or more SYNAPSE units from your army, subtract 1 from that Battle-shock test.

weaponKeywords.Devastating Wounds: Critical wounds (unmodified wound roll of 6) inflict mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic, and the attack sequence ends.
weaponKeywords.Lethal Hits: Critical hits (unmodified hit roll of 6) automatically wound the target.
weaponKeywords.Sustained Hits: Critical hits generate additional hits (number specified after the ability name).
weaponKeywords.Assault: Can shoot after Advancing (at -1 to hit).
weaponKeywords.Pistol: Can shoot in Engagement Range, but only at units within Engagement Range.
weaponKeywords.Blast: +1 attack per 5 models in target unit (minimum 3 attacks vs 6+ models).
weaponKeywords.Rapid Fire: Double the Attacks characteristic when targeting within half range.
weaponKeywords.Heavy: +1 to hit if the bearer's unit Remained Stationary this turn.
weaponKeywords.Anti-: Improves wound roll against targets with the specified keyword (e.g., Anti-Vehicle 4+ wounds on 4+ vs Vehicles).
weaponKeywords.Hazardous: After resolving attacks, roll one D6. On a 1, bearer suffers 3 mortal wounds.
weaponKeywords.Psychic: This is a Psychic Attack. Some abilities and rules specifically interact with Psychic attacks.
weaponKeywords.Precision: When targeting a unit with an attached Leader, attacks with this ability can target the Character instead of the unit.
weaponKeywords.Extra Attacks: These attacks are made in addition to the bearer's normal attacks, using the weapon's profile.
weaponKeywords.Ignores Cover: The target does not receive the benefit of cover against attacks with this ability.
weaponKeywords.Indirect Fire: Can target units not visible to the bearer, but subtract 1 from Hit rolls when doing so.
weaponKeywords.Melta: When targeting within half range, add X to the Damage characteristic (Melta 2 = +2 Damage).

weapon.name: Anti-X #+
weapon.description: Improve AP by 1 and wound on #+ against targets with keyword X.

weapon.name: Assault
weapon.description: Can be shot after Advancing.

weapon.name: Blast
weapon.description: +1 Attack per 5 models in target unit.

weapon.name: Devastating Wounds
weapon.description: Critical wounds inflict mortal wounds equal to Damage, no saves allowed.

weapon.name: Extra Attacks
weapon.description: Attacks with this weapon are made in addition to other weapons.

weapon.name: Hazardous
weapon.description: After resolving attacks, roll D6. On 1, bearer suffers 3 mortal wounds (Characters) or is destroyed (other models).

weapon.name: Heavy
weapon.description: +1 to Hit if unit Remained Stationary.

weapon.name: Ignores Cover
weapon.description: Target does not benefit from cover.

weapon.name: Indirect Fire
weapon.description: Can target units not visible. -1 to Hit, +1 to target's Save if not visible.

weapon.name: Lance
weapon.description: +1 to Wound if unit charged this turn.

weapon.name: Lethal Hits
weapon.description: Critical hits automatically wound (no wound roll needed).

weapon.name: Melta X
weapon.description: +X Damage against targets within half range.

weapon.name: One Shot
weapon.description: Can only be used once per battle.

weapon.name: Pistol
weapon.description: Can be shot in Engagement Range, but only at units in Engagement Range.

weapon.name: Precision
weapon.description: On critical wounds, attacker can allocate wound to a Character or Attached model.

weapon.name: Psychic
weapon.description: Weapon has the Psychic keyword for ability interactions.

weapon.name: Rapid Fire X
weapon.description: +X Attacks when targeting units within half range.

weapon.name: Sustained Hits X
weapon.description: Critical hits score X additional hits.

weapon.name: Torrent
weapon.description: Automatically hits (no hit roll needed).

weapon.name: Twin-linked
weapon.description: Re-roll wound rolls.

faction.name: Synapse
faction.description: Units with Synapse provide a 6" aura. Friendly TYRANIDS units within Synapse Range take Battle-shock tests on 3D6 instead of 2D6. Many stratagems and abilities reference Synapse Range.

faction.name: Shadow in the Warp
faction.description: Once per battle, in either player's Command phase, if one or more units with this ability are on the battlefield, every enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test. Enemies within 6" of SYNAPSE units subtract 1 from the test.

faction.name: Endless Multitude
faction.description: Represents the vast swarms of lesser Tyranid bioforms. Units with this keyword interact with specific stratagems that can return destroyed models or provide bonuses based on unit size. Key units: Termagants, Hormagaunts.

faction.name: Great Devourer
faction.description: The faction keyword for all Tyranid units. Represents the all-consuming nature of the Hive Mind. All Tyranid units have this keyword and it is used for army-wide rules and ability interactions.

faction.name: Harvester
faction.description: Units specialized in biomass collection and regeneration. In Assimilation Swarm detachment, HARVESTER units can Regenerate nearby friendly units. Key units: Psychophage, Haruspex, Pyrovores, Ripper Swarms.

faction.name: Burrowers
faction.description: Units that can tunnel beneath the battlefield. In Subterranean Assault detachment, BURROWERS create Tunnel Markers when arriving from reserves. Key units: Trygon, Mawloc, Raveners.

unit.name: Battleline
unit.description: Core troop units. May have special rules in certain detachments.

unit.name: Character
unit.description: Can lead units, receive Enhancements, and is targeted by Precision.

unit.name: Monster
unit.description: Large creatures with powerful stats. Often have high Toughness, many Wounds, and Deadly Demise. Key units: Hive Tyrant, Carnifexes.

unit.name: Psyker
unit.description: Can use Psychic abilities. The Tyranid Hive Mind manifests through these creatures.

unit.name: Vanguard Invader
unit.description: Units that specialize in rapid assault and infiltration ahead of the main swarm. Often have Scouts ability.

unit.name: Leader
unit.description: Can be attached to Bodyguard units. Abilities affect the combined unit.

unit.name: Feel No Pain X+
unit.description: Roll D6 when losing a wound. On X+, wound is ignored.

unit.name: Deadly Demise X
unit.description: When destroyed, roll D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers X mortal wounds.

unit.name: Scouts X"
unit.description: Make a Normal move of up to X" before first turn begins.
